results.title: Feeding metformin during pregnancy and lactation periods improved learning and memory impairment in the rat offspring exposed to febrile seizure: Role of oxidative stress and inflammatory response.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: According to the present findings, the prenatal and lactation exposure to the highest dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ demonstrated significant difference with @<m>DISEASE_Seizures_Febrile</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003294 @@@FS@@@ group in both behavioural and biochemical test analyses.
